rooms.description: Spacious area designed with comfortable seating and natural lighting. Focal point is the entrance from the front, ensuring a welcoming Vastu-compliant layout.
Adjacent to the kitchen and living room for easy flow of movement; designed with local architectural motifs.
Includes a spacious balcony on the West-facing side in accordance with Vastu principles, ensuring ample light and fresh air. Additional privacy features.
Includes a separate balcony to maintain privacy and natural lighting, aligning with local cultural aesthetics.
Equipped with its own balcony for fresh air and scenic views. Designed in a colonial style with comfortable proportions.
Functional guest area with a small seating nook, also featuring a balcony to maintain consistency with other bedrooms.
Modern colonial style kitchen integrated with the dining and living areas for convenience. Built with local building norms in mind.
Includes a compact utility area and bathroom space ensuring efficient use of space, following local safety standards.

openings.description: Grand colonial style entrance door aligned with Vastu principles for optimal energy flow and security.
Each bedroom has its own balcony opening facing the West, ensuring natural ventilation and light in accordance with Vastu guidelines.
Dual garage door for a two-car parking space. Designed to blend with the colonial architecture while meeting local safety norms.

garage.description: Constructed as an extension of the ground floor, this garage is designed for easy vehicle access and storage in line with building standards.

balconies.description: Spacious balcony ensuring ample natural light and view, following Vastu recommendations for personal space.
Balcony designed to provide privacy and fresh air, in alignment with local architectural styles.
Consistent with the other bedrooms, this balcony is positioned for optimal light exposure.
Balcony providing a pleasant outdoor view and natural ventilation as per Vastu principles.

additional_features.description: A small central courtyard integrated into the design for light and ventilation, respecting both colonial aesthetics and local building norms.
Traditional colonial fireplace adds warmth and character to the living space, enhancing the overall ambience.
